alert.note: Alert for Snohomish (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 11:39PM PST until January 13 at 7:18AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Washington... Stillaguamish River At Arlington affecting Snohomish County. Snoqualmie River Near Carnation affecting King County. Snoqualmie River Near Snoqualmie Falls affecting King County. .Heavy rain has come to an end, with these rivers continuing to gradually recede through Thursday. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occuring. * WHERE...Stillaguamish River At Arlington. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:55 PM PST Wednesday the stage was 13.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continuing falling tonight. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 545 AM PST.
